alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 14 at 3:42PM CDT until June 14 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: .Locally heavy rain over the same areas may cause some urban and small stream flooding the next few hours. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following county, Montgomery. * WHEN...Until 545 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 342 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Montgomery, Pike Road, Pinedale, Eastdale Mall, Auburn University In Montgomery, Lagoon Park, Gunter Air Force Base, Alabama State University, Alabama State Capitol, Montgomery Zoo, Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium, Boylston, Mount Meigs, Hyundai Motors Of Alabama, Maxwell Air Force Base, Woodcrest, Hope Hull, Waugh, Dannelly Field and Hunter.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
